title: Define configurable rate limit tiers per tenant
summary: Configure rate limits per tenant to prevent abuse and ensure fairness, with adjustable tiers for different usage levels.

title: Implement burst and sustained rate limits
summary: Implement rate limiting with burst and sustained limits to handle sudden spikes and prolonged usage, ensuring system stability.

title: Allow real-time updates to tenant rate limit configurations
summary: Enable real-time updates to rate limit configurations for each tenant, ensuring flexibility and responsiveness to changing usage patterns.

title: Integrate rate limiting logic at API gateway or ingress controller layer
summary: Integrate rate limiting logic at the API gateway or ingress controller layer to efficiently manage and enforce rate limits.

title: Provide instant feedback to clients when limits are approached or exceeded
summary: Provide instant feedback to clients when rate limits are approached or exceeded, enabling them to adjust their usage and avoid interruptions.

title: Log rate limiting actions and breaches per tenant
summary: Log rate limiting actions and breaches for each tenant, providing valuable insights for optimization and security.

title: Implement dashboards and alerting mechanisms for rate limit breaches
summary: Implement dashboards and alerting mechanisms to notify administrators and clients of rate limit breaches, ensuring prompt action and minimizing downtime.

title: Expose per-tenant usage metrics via API and/or developer portal
summary: Expose per-tenant usage metrics through the API and/or developer portal, enabling clients to monitor their usage and optimize their applications.

title: Generate monthly usage and rate limit breach reports
summary: Generate monthly reports on usage and rate limit breaches for each tenant, providing valuable insights for optimization and planning.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: monthly usage and rate limit breach reports

title: Detect and mitigate attempts to circumvent limits
summary: Detect and mitigate attempts to circumvent rate limits, ensuring the stability and security of the API and preventing abuse.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: detect and mitigate attempts to circumvent limits

title: Ensure rate limiting logic is resilient to spoofing of tenant IDs or credentials
summary: Implement secure rate limiting to prevent spoofing of tenant IDs or credentials, ensuring the stability and security of the B2B developer platform.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: rate limiting logic resilient to spoofing

title: Require multi-factor approval for high-tier tenants
summary: Implement multi-factor approval for high-tier tenants to enhance security and prevent unauthorized access to the B2B developer platform.

title: Conduct phased rollout by tenant segment
summary: Conduct a phased rollout of the new rate limiting feature by tenant segment to ensure a smooth and stable transition for all tenants.

title: Provide sandbox environments for clients to test behavior under new rate limits
summary: Provide sandbox environments for clients to test and evaluate the behavior of their applications under the new rate limits, ensuring a seamless integration.

title: Update developer documentation and FAQs to explain new rate limit policies
summary: Update the developer documentation and FAQs to clearly explain the new rate limit policies, ensuring that developers have the necessary information to adapt their applications.
